name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Frontend Engineer with 13+ years of experience in crafting high-performance applications, primarily utilizing **JavaScript**, **HTML**, **CSS**, and UI/UX design principles for responsive and adaptive interfaces. Proficient in **C#** and **.NET**, with a solid understanding of cross-browser compatibility and Git version control to ensure seamless integration and deployment. 
Skilled in both frontend and backend development, leveraging frameworks such as **React**, **Vue**, and **Next.js**, and experienced in **Python** for backend support. 
Demonstrated capability in delivering innovative AI/ML-powered solutions that enhance user experience through predictive analytics and real-time processing. 
Familiar with cloud deployment on **Azure** and adept at implementing CI/CD pipelines, ensuring efficient and reliable development workflows. Committed to maintaining compliance with industry standards and enhancing overall application performance.
